original_text: And when they came to a place called Golgotha (which means Place of a Skull),
korean_text: 골고다 즉 해골의 곳이라는 곳에 이르러

sentences.original_text: And when they came to a place called Golgotha
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 골고다라는 곳에 왔을 때

sentences.original_text: which means Place of a Skull
